# Lyra Tool Discovery

Welcome to the Lyra Tool Discovery contributing community!

## About This Project

Lyra Tool Discovery is an AI-powered tool that discovers MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers, APIs, and plugins from GitHub and npm. It uses AI (OpenAI or Anthropic) to analyze discovered tools and determine which of 8 plugin templates they should use for integration into the plugin.delivery marketplace.

We are committed to providing a welcoming and inclusive environment. Please be respectful and constructive in all interactions.
